descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/21416-1-1343733111.jpg[/img]

[/center]



[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1343733111.png[/img]

Dryads are mythological beings; they are the protectors of the woods. Each Dryad is linked to their own tree, a tree that they have to keep safe, if the tree dies, they die. Anyone who tries to harm their tree will be punished. Dryads are able to use the forces of nature to their advantage; to heal themselves and to harm others.

[url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/40867]Original Oblivion version[/url]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1343733111.png[/img]

Update 1.1

- 2 new staves that can be found at "Eldergleam Sanctuary"
>Nature's Revenge: Gust of Wind effect
>Roots' Grasp: Root effect
- New male textures

Main features

- Fully working custom race
- 4 eye textures
- 15 warpaint designs
- High resolution skin textures
- Race-specific body (UNP) with new underwear
- 12 pieces of clothing female only
- 4 circlets
- 2 necklaces female only

Skill Bonuses

- Destruction: 5
- Alteration: 5
- Illusion: 5
- Restoration: 10
- Alchemy: 5
- Enchanting: 5

Attributes

- Starting Health: 50
- Starting Magicka: 60
- Starting Stamina: 40
- Health Regen: 0.7
- Magicka Regen: 5.0
- Stamina Regen: 3.0

Spells & abilities

- Wooden Skin (Ability): Resist Damage 20% and Weakness to Fire 20%
- Root (Shout): Root 3 seconds
- Tree Link (Power): Restore Health and Restore Stamina 1 point per second

How to get clothing and accessories:

Method 1:
- Crafting: all pieces can be found under the Misc category

Method 2:
- Open the console (press ~)
- Type "help garland", "help leaf", "help autumn", "help shorts", "help top" or "help lifeseed" and press enter
- Type "player.additem [ID of the item you want, without brackets] [amount, without brackets] and press enter

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1343733248.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2689072]zzjay:[/url]

- Starting the project
- Most of the Creation Kit work
- Conversion of accessories
- Old male skin
- Additional testing

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/726673]Xenius:[/url]

- Female skin
- New male skin
- Eyes
- Warpaint
- Clothing

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-5-1343733111.png[/img]

Manual installation is recommended.

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

Activate the Dryad Race.esp file
Activate the RaceCompatibility.esm file

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1343733183.png[/img]

Deactivate the Dryad Race.esp file

Remove the following files and folders:
Data\Dryad Race.esp
Data\Scripts\DryadRaceController.pex
Data\Scripts\Source\DryadRaceController.psc

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-2-1343733183.png[/img]

[b]WARNING for DAWNGUARD users![/b]

This mod has been created before the release of the Danwnguard dlc. People reported issues with custom races, not sure if this will even have any. I'll eventually fix this, as soon as dawnguard is released in my country.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21639]Simple guide to fix issues[/url]

This custom race is compatible with any other mod.

Do not add the race to any formlists manually, or you'll break it. It will result in conflicts with
all other mods that alter formlists!

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1343733183.png[/img]

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

A custom body is included in the mod; as such, a body replacer will not be required to be able to use this race.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1343733242.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21082]XCE - Brows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21590]Dryad companions[/url]

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1343733183.png[/img]

- Using the "showracemenu" command twice will result in loosing headparts and inability to select
hairstyle and eyes.
> We have been told this is a Creation Kit bug that should be fixed in the upcoming update.

- Some necklaces will not show up on custom bodies.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-5-1343733183.png[/img]

None yet.

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1343733242.png[/img]

[01-08-2012] 1.0 - Initial Release
[05-08-2012] 1.1 - Update: new male textures, adds 2 staves
[18-08-2012] 1.1 - Update: added optional German version

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-2-1343733242.png[/img]

pascaliedema for converting the staff

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1343733242.png[/img]

The contents of this mod are open source and can be used freely on the following conditions:

- Credit us
- Notify us
- Skyrim only
